```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
```

```{r}
# Read in data
ces <- read.csv(here("data", "ces3demographics.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()
```


```{r}
ggplot(ces, aes(x = white, y = ces_3_0_score))+
  geom_hex() +
  labs(x = "White population",
       y = "CES Score",
       title = "Pollution burden measued as CES for White population")+
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "navy", high = "orange") +
  theme_minimal()
```
